title: Coconut Land for Sale in Andigama
details:
Sri Lanka is a country known for its Tea, Coconut &Rubber exports. This is good investment for outside investors. This coconut land is located in the North Western province of Sri Lanka in the area which is known as the Coconut Triangle. The whole land is bearing. At present the coconut yield profit is about 2000$. with more improvements and periodical manoeuvring profits can be doubled. Although foreigners are not permitted to purchase properties in Sri Lanka they may hold long term lease hold rights without any legal obstacle. There is sufficient water for the cultivation as the land is located next to a tank. Land owned by a Lawyer. (+94)0718499903 (+94)0777510275 please contact.

Visit link below for more details.
